subject: Basketball (College)
Alcohol Abuse
lead_paragraph: Now 17 years sober, King Rice, in his third season as Monmouth’s basketball coach, is helping his players learn from the mistakes he made as a player and as a coach.
snippet: Now 17 years sober, King Rice, in his third season as Monmouth’s basketball coach, is helping his players learn from the mistakes he made as a player and as a coach.
